projects.name: Automatic Number Plate Recognition with IBM Cloud

education.degree: Post Graduate Diploma - Artificial Intelligence and Data Science

projects.name: Student Support Chatbot (Chatflix)
projects.description: RAG-based chatbot for Loyalist College and Toronto Business College.
details: Built a RAG-based chatbot to provide students with information about college policies.
Retrieves relevant policies based on student queries and provides customized responses.
Developed a Moodle Plugin for students and a server portal for maintenance staff.
Utilized LangChain and LLMs for natural language processing.
Implemented PostgreSQL for data storage and retrieval.
Deployed the application using Docker and managed version control with GitHub.
Collaborated with a team of 8 to design and implement the chatbot.
Conducted user testing and gathered feedback for continuous improvement.
Ensured compliance with college policies and data privacy regulations.
Presented the project to college stakeholders and received positive feedback for its usability and effectiveness.

projects.name: Enhancing Medical Data Security Using NTRU Algorithm and Steganography
projects.description: Python GUI for medical data security.
details: Developed a custom Python GUI with cryptographic functionalities for securing medical records.
Implemented NTRU algorithm for encryption and decryption of medical data.
Used steganography techniques to hide sensitive information within images.
Designed an intuitive user interface using Tkinter for easy interaction.
Ensured data integrity and confidentiality through robust security measures.
Conducted thorough testing to validate the effectiveness of the security features.
Collaborated with healthcare professionals to gather requirements and feedback.
Published in the INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL FOR INNOVATIVE ENGINEERING AND MANAGEMENT RESEARCH.

projects.name: Automatic Number Plate Recognition with IBM Cloud
projects.description: Web app for vehicle number plate recognition
details: Created a website for public use of number plate recognition software.
Integrated Rapid API for image processing and number plate recognition.
Developed a dashboard using Python Flask to handle image submissions and display results.
Ensured user-friendly interface and efficient performance.
Conducted testing to validate the accuracy of number plate recognition.
Collaborated with team members to enhance functionality and user experience.

projects.name: VIRTUAL LABS for Mechanics of Solid Lab
details: Developed virtual labs for users to simulate practical civil labs on their devices.
Created a web application using SVG and HTML canvas for interactive simulations.
Implemented JavaScript for mechanics and physics calculations.
Designed user-friendly interfaces with CSS for an engaging user experience.
Collaborated with a team to ensure accurate simulations and educational value.
Conducted user testing to gather feedback and improve functionality.
Published the project on GitLab for educational use.
Key features include interactive simulations, real-time calculations, and detailed explanations of mechanics concepts.
Project implemented under the guidance of IIT Roorkee.

projects.name: Pocket Dynamos Portal
projects.description: Web portfolio for rising local cricket club.
details: Developed a web portal for a local cricket club to showcase players, teams, matches, and merchandise.
Designed and implemented the portal using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Created a user-friendly interface for easy navigation and information access.
Implemented features for displaying player profiles, team statistics, and match schedules.
Ensured responsive design for compatibility across devices.
Collaborated with club members to gather requirements and feedback.
Published the project on GitHub for public access.
Key features include player profiles, team statistics, match schedules, club merchandise and a contact form for inquiries.
Project aimed at promoting local cricket talent and enhancing community engagement.
